snippet: The Eagles failed to adjust to several new additions and a lockout-crunched off-season last year, leading to an 8-8 finish. The team is preaching cohesiveness in training camp.
abstract: Judy Battista On Pro Football column notes that the Philadelphia Eagles are preaching cohesiveness in training camp after failing to adjust to several new additions and a lockout-crunched off-season last year, finishing 8-8.
lead_paragraph: The Eagles failed to adjust to several new additions and a lockout-crunched off-season last year, leading to an 8-8 finish. The team is preaching cohesiveness in training camp.

headline.seo: Eagles Look to Rebound From Last Season’s Scramble
headline.main: With the Pieces Now in Place, the Eagles Try Again
headline.print_headline: With the Pieces Now Firmly in Place, the Eagles Try Again
